title: Heuristic-Based Health Education Intervention Design via Microlearning

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: 5–7 minute modular learning using mobile apps in a BYOD environment, structured around real-world application cases.

learning_goals: Participants can design a needs analysis phase based on health behavior change theory.
Participants can apply a three-stage (analysis-design-evaluation) instructional intervention framework using heuristic approaches.
Participants can develop at least one microlearning content module executable in mobile environments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
